training_plan.title: Web Developer Intern Internship Training Plan
training_plan.description: A comprehensive training plan for a 210-hour internship in the Web Development division, designed to equip interns with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel as a Web Developer Intern.

tasks.title: Task 1: HTML & CSS Coding
tasks.description: Create and design a simple 5-page website from scratch using HTML and CSS only.

tasks.title: Task 2: JavaScript Fundamentals
tasks.description: Implement basic JavaScript functionalities such as DOM manipulation and event handling in a simple webpage.

tasks.title: Task 3: Responsive Web Design
tasks.description: Convert a static website into a responsive one using CSS media queries and/or Bootstrap.

skills.name: Responsive Web Design
skills.description: Ability to create websites that adjust according to different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Task 4: HTML & CSS Web Page Development
tasks.description: Develop a static web page using HTML and CSS. The web page should have a responsive design and follow accessibility guidelines.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: Styling and layout of web pages using CSS

tasks.title: Task 5: Introduction to Javascript
tasks.description: Implement basic functionalities of a web page using JavaScript. Understand variables, data types, functions, loops, and conditionals.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: Building dynamic web pages using JavaScript

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Understanding basic programming concepts in JavaScript

skills.name: Programming Fundamentals
skills.description: Basic programming concepts, data types, and control flow
